name: Bushido Sushi
description:
Welcome to Bushido Sushi; a fast-paced precision game for sushi lovers! Simply tap on the screen to use your chopsticks to grab freshly made sushi from the conveyor belt. Utilize accuracy and skill to complete your platter while avoiding Chef Ika's tentacles. Snatch garnishes, such as wasabi and soy sauce, to increase the amount of coins earned per sushi. Unlock over 50 new chopsticks to up your game and increase your profit. At each 20th Level show Chef Ika what you are made of by acing his exam and advance to the next rank.

Can you beat the 200 Levels to become the Ultimate Sushi Master?

FEATURES:

- Play and beat more than 200 Levels.
- Collect all 60 different Chopsticks designs.
- Use strategy to collect garnishes that will optimize your coin rewards.
- Become the #1 Sushi Master and beat everyone on the Leaderboards!

Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/bootjetgames/
